level.text: Motor carriers and shippers shall be required to comply with all other federal regulations that are referenced in title 49 of the Code of Federal Regulations, Parts 171 through 180, and 382, 383, 385, 386, 387, 388, and 389 through 399 and the Federal Hazardous Materials Regulations Part 107 (subparts F and G only).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 8861 (November 3, 2000); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 1942(February 29, 2008).
